title: Best rocky road EVER
ingredients: ['200g digestive biscuits', '135g butter', '200g dark chocolate, roughly chopped', '2 to 3 tablespoons golden syrup', '100g marshmallows', 'Optional additions', 'raisins/dried fruit', 'Mars® bar, chopped', 'Twix® bar, chopped', 'Maltesers®, chopped', 'Dolly mix']
